markdownDescription:
**Specifies how to index fields at different paths for this index**. 

 Specify dynamic or static mapping of fields. To disable dynamic mapping, set `dynamic` to `false`. By default, dynamic mapping is enabled. If you disable dynamic mapping, you must specify the fields to index. To learn more about dynamic and static mappings, see [Review Atlas Search Index Syntax](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/index-definitions/#std-label-ref-index-definitions).

dynamic.markdownDescription: Flag that indicates whether the index uses dynamic or static mappings. Required if `mappings.fields` is omitted.

fields.markdownDescription: One or more field specifications for the Atlas Search index. Required **only** if `mappings.dynamic` is omitted or set to `false`.
